name: Love Rush
description:
This game was created for the Game Jam "Godot Wild Jam #30"

Be sure to post below your best Score / Killed ratio! I'd love to know your scores! Can you make it to the win screen? - yes there's a win screen!

This is my second game ever made.

Inspired by Vimlark's "Flyer Kid"

Controls

Movement - W,A,S,D

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Sounds provided by LittleRobotSoundFactory on freesound.org
